WorkItem.Description:
Build a layout in ExtJS for the score board, which will bind to a shared data object.

This task will be done in parallel with (or shortly after) roughing out a data object to store informaiton on scoring tools.

Comments.Message:
Resolved with changeset 71591: Fixed the scoreboard to render all the content on page load. 
Changed the Event object to display a more detailed error message.
Changed the extjs script version to the dev version that has the comments and readable code
Associated with changeset 71594: Several updates to the scoreboard to work better with current modules. Also, minor cosmetic changes.
